articles.description: Tuesday saw Manika Batra, a top-ranked table tennis player from India, climb three spots in the ITTF world rankings to a career-high position of 35. The 27-year-old had an exceptional performance to earn India's first-ever medal for a women's player at the As…
articles.content: After arriving home empty-handed from the Birmingham 2022 Commonwealth Games, she won a gold at the Asian Cup. She had a remarkable run of four medals, including two gold, four years prior at Gold Co… [+3 chars]
